description: Explore the cutting-edge of frontend animation and design with a deep dive into GSAP's premium plugins and CSS masking techniques. Discover the power of scroll-driven animations and new CSS features for improved reading experiences. Learn effective localization strategies with Figma's design tokens and gain insights into email accessibility improvements. Enhance your sites with innovative tools like Pages CMS and the HTML permission element, while optimizing performance through smart document requests.
joke: Why did the JavaScript function break up with the HTML document? Because it couldn't handle the scope of their relationship!
challenge: Create an interactive gallery using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript that leverages scroll-driven animations. As users scroll through your gallery, images should smoothly transition into view using CSS masking techniques. Incorporate a GSAP animation for a creative touch, and ensure the design is responsive by utilizing container queries to adjust layouts based on the viewport size.
